Tech.name: Harmony in Chaos
Tech.Description: The power of Earth grants infinite patience and endurance, strengthening the inherent tranquillity of monastic reserve and thus allowing a Defender to deliver telling remarks within the courts. Any time you spend a Void Point on an Etiquette or Courtier Social Skill roll, you gain a bonus of +Xk1 to the roll (where X is your Willpower) instead of the normal +1k1.

RequirementOption.text: Replaces any Brotherhood Monk 2 (except Four Temples)
